description: TK is one of the largest public health insurance providers in Germany, known for its excellent customer service and comprehensive coverage.
AOK is a major public health insurance company in Germany, offering a wide range of services and extensive regional coverage.
Barmer is a prominent public health insurer in Germany, providing comprehensive healthcare services to its members.
Ottonova is a digital-first private health insurance provider in Germany, recognized for its user-friendly app and concierge services.
HanseMerkur offers private health insurance plans in Germany, focusing on personalized customer service and comprehensive coverage.
Feather provides private health insurance tailored for expats in Germany, offering fully digital services and English-speaking support.
DKV is a well-established private health insurer in Germany, offering a variety of health insurance plans to meet diverse needs.
Hallesche provides private health insurance solutions in Germany, known for its comprehensive coverage and customer-oriented services.
Allianz is a leading global insurance provider offering a wide range of services, including property, casualty, life, and travel insurance.
AXA is a multinational insurance firm providing services such as vehicle, home, liability, and life insurance.
Gothaer offers various insurance products, including property, liability, and life insurance, catering to both private and corporate clients.
HUK-COBURG specializes in automobile insurance but also provides property, liability, and legal protection insurance.
ERGO is one of the major insurance groups in Germany, offering a comprehensive range of insurance products, including life, property, and legal protection insurance.
HDI provides various insurance solutions, including liability, property, and motor vehicle insurance for both individuals and businesses.
Signal Iduna offers a broad spectrum of insurance services, such as accident, property, and life insurance, tailored for private clients and small to medium-sized enterprises.
VHV Group specializes in property and casualty insurance, particularly in the construction sector, and also offers automobile insurance.
Talanx is a major European insurance group offering a range of services, including property, casualty, and life insurance, serving both private and corporate clients.
LV 1871 specializes in life, pension, and disability insurance, providing tailored solutions for individual retirement planning.
